dict_result.value: To travel on Amtrak, you will need a valid photo ID.  This could be a driver's license, state-issued ID card, passport, or military ID.  For minors, other forms of identification may be accepted depending on the age of the minor and the circumstances of their travel.  Specific details regarding acceptable forms of identification for minors can be found on the Amtrak website.  It is recommended to check the Amtrak website for the most up-to-date information on acceptable forms of identification before your trip.

step_list.text_content: To travel on Amtrak, you will need a valid photo ID.  This could be a driver's license, state-issued ID card, passport, or military ID.  For minors, other forms of identification may be accepted depending on the age of the minor and the circumstances of their travel.  Specific details regarding acceptable forms of identification for minors can be found on the Amtrak website.  It is recommended to check the Amtrak website for the most up-to-date information on acceptable forms of identification before your trip.
